name.de: One Page Favorites - Favoriten auf einer Seite
name.es: One Page Favorites - Favoritos de una Página
name.fr: One Page Favorites - Favoris d'une page
name.it: One Page Favorites - Preferiti di una pagina
name.ja: One Page Favorites 一ページのお気に入り
name.ko: One Page Favorites 한 페이지 즐겨찾기
name.zh_CN: One Page Favorites 一页收藏
name.zh_TW: One Page Favorites 一頁收藏

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Shows a unified view of the browser tabs, bookmarks, and visit history on one page.
short.de: Zeigt eine einheitliche Ansicht der Browser-Registerkarten, Lesezeichen und des Besuchsverlaufs auf einer Seite.
short.es: Este complemento del navegador muestra una vista unificada de las pestañas del navegador, los marcadores y el historial de visitas…
short.fr: Affiche une vue unifiée des onglets du navigateur, des signets et de l'historique des visites sur une seule page.
short.it: Mostra una visualizzazione unificata delle schede del browser, dei segnalibri e della cronologia delle visite su un'unica pagina.
short.ja: ブラウザのタブ、ブックマーク、訪問履歴を 1 ページに統合して表示します。
short.ko: 브라우저 탭, 북마크, 방문 기록을 한 페이지에 통합하여 표시합니다.
short.zh_CN: 在一页上显示浏览器选项卡、书签和访问历史记录的统一视图。
short.zh_TW: 在一頁上顯示瀏覽器標籤、書籤和存取記錄的統一視圖。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show a unified view of the browser tabs, bookmarks, and visit history on one page.

Do you have many tabs open and need to locate one quickly?  Have thousands of bookmarks and not sure what them are?  A website you visited a while ago and not sure its address? This extension can help. It shows all those on one page, letting you search and navigate them with ease.  It help you get to your favorite sites quickly.
